channel.title: CS:S (and pretty much any Valve game w/ sprays) Spray Pack 1
channel.description:
Posting for lulz, maybe some of the members will find these useful. Installation instructions are included.
Includes some basic decoy sprays (you'll see + the bomb one is animated), the LOL JEBUS PP spray (for trolling all your favorite Christian servers), and of course, the [juden] Swazzy (swastika) spray.
http://downloads.io9Labs.com/sprayz.zip
WoW 72 vIEws And nO rEplIEz. lEechErZ.

item.title: CS:S (and pretty much any Valve game w/ sprays) Spray Pack 1
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Cool, I used to have one of a CT shooting while moving back and fourth.

It made lots of people mad.
